name: Upgrade (neilsounds)
description: Welcome to UPGRADE. The robotics manufacturing facility is being attacked by their rivals who are determined to bring an end to the corporation running it. The system has been hacked causing a malfunction within the lab AI. In desperation, [the corp] has sanctioned an update which has driven the robots to seek the upgrade pods, housing an entirely new model which had been kept top secret until now. Play as the last of the old model robots and fight your way through the lab using your abilities strategically for they have been corrupted and must be recharged at charging stations! A brand new body awaits for the robot who can make it to the end.
